text: is there a way to hide/protect hubl code that is packaged with a theme?  or does anyone that purchase/download a theme get all the assets and access to the source code?  are there any best practices on obfuscating or anything along those lines?
All code is fully accessible, you could invest some resources into a headless theme if you want to lock anything down... but there would be trade offs
could you please describe how a headless theme in this case would look like?
HubSpot is opening up a lot of cms data in their api
You wont be able to protect the code, simply because the HubSpot team review all submissions.
If you’re adding it to the marketplace I imagine a headless theme wouldn’t be accepted, but don’t quite me on that. Check marketplace submission guidelines.
